name: Shadowrun Name Generator
description: Dive into the gritty, neon-lit world of Shadowrun with our name generator! Create authentic, cyberpunk-infused names for your runners, fixers, and megacorp executives. Ready to jack in and forge your legend in the Sixth World?
introduction: Welcome, chummer, to the Shadowrun Name Generator! Whether you're crafting a hardened street samurai, a smooth-talking decker, or a ruthless corporate suit, a killer name is your first step to leaving your mark on the sprawl. Our generator blends gritty realism with cyberpunk flair, giving you names that resonate with the dark, tech-laden atmosphere of Shadowrun. So, ditch the generic handles and get ready to roll some dice on your identity!
howToUse: First, take a deep breath of that delicious smog (optional, but highly immersive).
Smash that 'Generate' button like you're hacking a mainframe (figuratively, please).
Behold! A name worthy of the shadows appears before your very eyes.
Don't like it? Mash that button again! We've got more names than the Ares Firewatch has bullets.
Copy and paste that perfect name into your character sheet and prepare to become a legend. Or, you know, just another statistic. But with a *cool* name.

faqs.question: What kind of names does this generator create?
faqs.answer: This generator creates names inspired by the Shadowrun universe, including street names, code names, and corporate titles. Expect a blend of gritty realism, cyberpunk aesthetics, and a dash of pure cool.

faqs.question: Are the generated names actually 'good'?
faqs.answer: Good is subjective, chummer! But we've put a lot of effort into crafting names that feel authentic to the Shadowrun setting. If you're looking for something that screams 'cyberpunk badass,' you're in the right place.

faqs.question: Can I use these names for commercial purposes?
faqs.answer: While we're not lawyers, we can tell you that the names generated are intended for creative use. However, it's always a good idea to do your own research to ensure you're not infringing on any existing trademarks.

faqs.question: Is this generator free to use?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! Jack in and generate as many names as your heart desires. We're here to help you create the perfect Shadowrunner without costing you a single nuyen.

faqs.question: Will you add more name options in the future?
faqs.answer: We're always looking for ways to improve our generators. Stay tuned for updates and new features! Got a suggestion? Hit us up, omae!

faqs.question: Why are some names a bit… weird?
faqs.answer: The Sixth World is a weird place, chummer! Sometimes the best names are the ones that make you raise an eyebrow. Embrace the weirdness, it's what makes Shadowrun so unique.
